title: Assessing the potential of nifedipine and resveratrol to enhance ovarian viability in conjunction with detorsion treatment: A rat ovarian torsion model study.
abstract: Evaluating the therapeutic effect of detorsion, resveratrol, and nifedipine on ovarian viability assessed by biochemical, histopathological and immunohistochemical parameters and markers of oxidative stress.
journal: Turkish journal of obstetrics and gynecology
